{"id":881307680,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1674146254,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/881307680/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isVowel(char ch) {\n        return (ch == 'a' || ch == 'e' || ch == 'i' || ch == 'o' || ch == 'u' || ch == 'A' || ch == 'E' || ch == 'I' || ch == 'O' || ch == 'U' );\n    }\n\n    void swapStr(string& s, int left, int right) {\n        char temp = s[left];\n        s[left] = s[right];\n        s[right] = temp;\n    }\n\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        int left = 0;\n        int right = s.size() - 1;\n\n        while(left < right) {\n            if(isVowel(s[left]) && isVowel(s[right])) {\n                swapStr(s, left, right);\n                left++;\n                right--;\n            }\n\n            else if(!isVowel(s[right])) right--;\n            else if(!isVowel(s[left])) left++;\n        }\n\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false}
